branch.title: The Adventure Begins
branch.question: The choice is yours. Where would you like to start?
branch.p: Men, women, searchers, wanderers, people who just want to get home, all of them send their prayers to you in the hope you will hear them and grant them aid.
But will you? You are a God, after all, and these mortals can make such fun playthings.

choice.selection: A prayer from someone searching for an herb in the Wicked Forest.
